title: Surya The Sun God and the Cockerel
description: The animals are all moaning about being too hot, so Suriya the Sun God decides to stop shining. Listen to Peter Chand telling this fun tale from India, and find how the birds persuade the sun to shine once again.
itunes:title: Surya The Sun God and the Cockerel
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
